thread.title: Euro zone summit aims to keep Greece in single currency
thread.title_full: Euro zone summit aims to keep Greece in single currency

author: Expert
title: Euro zone summit aims to keep Greece in single currency
text:
Business News businessNews Expert 
BRUSSELS (Reuters) – Euro zone leaders will fight to the finish to keep near-bankrupt Greece in the single currency on Sunday after the European Union’s chairman canceled a planned summit of all 28 EU leaders that would have been needed in case of a “Grexit”.
